sentence.Network_en: The police will not relent in their fight against crime.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方在跟犯罪分子的斗争中决不手软.

sentence.Network_en: Your own family might in time relent.
sentence.Network_cn: 你自己的家庭总有一天会变温和.

sentence.Network_en: I confess the inhumanity of this action moved me very much, and made me relent exceedingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 我自认这种不人道的举动使我很痛心, 我非常怜悯她.

英文单词有关虚弱_百度知道 ... puny adj. 弱小的，发育不良的 relent v. 减弱；动怜悯心 relenting adj. 减弱的，怜悯的.
英文单词有关虚弱_百度知道 ... puny adj. 弱小的，发育不良的 relent v. 减弱；动怜悯心 relenting adj. 减弱的，怜悯的.

list.abs: Smiling helps top relent us from looking tired , worn down and overwhelmed., 微笑可以顶雷文我们看上去很疲惫 , 磨损下来 , 不知所措.
in the morning the storm relented a little .早晨大风暴减弱了一些。
in the morning the storm relented a little ., 早晨大风暴减弱了一些.
So why have our monetary authorities finally relented ?, 那么 , 为什么我们的货币当局终于让步?
then the Lord relented and did not bring on his people the disaster he had threatened .于是耶和华后悔，不把所说的祸降与他的百姓。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'dissolve, melt'): based on Latin re- 'back' + lentare 'to bend' (from lentus 'flexible')

entry.def: If you relent, you allow someone to do something that you had previously refused to allow them to do.

example.ex: Finally his mother relented and gave permission for her youngest son to marry.
example.tran: 最后他母亲作出让步，允许她的小儿子结婚。

entry.def: If bad weather relents, it improves.

example.ex: If the weather relents, the game will be finished today.
example.tran: 如果天气转好的话，比赛将在今天结束。

means.word_mean: 1. give in, as to influence or pressure

auth_sentence.content: It was a scene to make her heart relent.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a scene to make her heart relent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a scene to make her heart relent.

auth_sentence.content: Over the next two days, Ennis would never relent.
auth_sentence.res_content: Over the next two days, Ennis would never relent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Over the next two days, Ennis would never relent.

auth_sentence.content: Her sobs...became more subdued...a signal to Dan that she would soon relent.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her sobs...became more subdued...a signal to Dan that she would soon relent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her sobs...became more subdued...a signal to Dan that she would soon relent.

sentences.en: He was cross at first, but later he relented.
sentences.cn: 他起初很生气,后来变温和了。

sentences.en: At first she threatened to dismiss me, but later she relented.
sentences.cn: 起初她威胁要解雇我, 但后来她态度软化了。
